law.catch_line: Motion or rule -- No attorney's fee allowed.
law.text: A motion or rule of court shall be considered an action, but when it is made in a pending suit or action, no attorney's fee shall be recovered as part of the costs of the motion or rule.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 898.
